message: I celebrate this time of year for the same reason your church decided to back in around 350 CE ...the winter solstice; a solar event which has been celebrated since the dawn of mankind, many tens and possibly hundreds of thousands of years before the papyrus scribblings of some fearful desert dwellers... It really doesn't matter how un-Christlike you people act by trying to exclude the secular world from the joy and fellowship of the season...because: history. Happy holidays, I hope you have a nice Christmas. I'm pretty sure your Jesus would want EVERYONE to enjoy the season...even us heathens. Sorry you don't like the idea of sharing something that your religion stole in the first place.
